pages.text: By the fig (or the place Tiin where Noahâ€™s ship embarked), and the olive (or Zaita in Jerusalam, were Jesus received and preached the message of God)
and Mount Sinai (where Moses received the message of God)
and this city of security (Mecca, where our prophet Muhammad initially received and preached the message of God, all these are witnesses that)
We had indeed created man in the best form
then We brought him back as the lowest of those who are low
except those who believed and did righteous works, then for them there is an unfailing reward
Then after this what makes you deny the judgment
Is not God the Best Judge, of all the judges
Recite in the name of your Lord Who created
He created man from something that clings and hangs (like a leech)
Recite, and your Lord is the Most Honourable
Who taught with the pen
He taught man that which he did not know
No, man certainly rebels
because he sees himself independent
Certainly, towards your Lord is the return
Have you seen him who forbids
when a servant of God worships
Have you seen, if he is on guidance
or enjoins guarding (against evil)
Have you seen, if he denies and turns (his back)
did he not know that God certainly sees
No, if he does not stop, We will drag him, seizing him by his forelock
the denying, sinful forelock
So let him call his council
We will call the soldiers (guards of hell)
No, do not obey him but prostrate and draw near (to God)
